user_question: Can you suggest a vegetarian meal plan for a week and generate an image of a vegetarian dish?
final_answer: Vegetarian meal plan: Monday - Lentil soup, Tuesday - Veggie stir-fry, Wednesday - Quinoa salad, Thursday - Vegetable curry, Friday - Pasta primavera, Saturday - Veggie tacos, Sunday - Grilled vegetable skewers. Image of a vegetarian dish generated. Vegetable curry recipe: Ingredients - 2 tbsp oil, 1 onion, 2 garlic cloves, 1 tbsp curry powder, 1 can coconut milk, assorted vegetables (carrots, bell peppers, peas), salt to taste. Instructions - Sauté onion and garlic in oil, add curry powder, stir in coconut milk and vegetables, simmer until vegetables are tender.
